intro: Parakeelya, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the genus Saintpaulia and is characterized by its velvety, dark green leaves and showy, colorful flowers. The plant thrives in bright, indirect light and requires well-draining soil to prevent root rot. Parakeelya is popular as a houseplant due to its ability to bloom throughout the year under proper care. Its compact growth habit makes it ideal for indoor cultivation and decorative arrangements.
